name: Tax Summary Report
query: select tabInvoices.invoice_type as "", round(sum(tabItems.item_value),2) as `Taxable Value`, round(sum(tabItems.cgst_amount),2) as CGST, round(sum(tabItems.sgst_amount),2) as SGST, round(sum(tabItems.igst_amount),2) as IGST, round(sum(tabItems.cess_amount),2) as CESS from tabInvoices JOIN tabItems ON tabInvoices.name = tabItems.parent where tabInvoices.irn_generated in ("Success","NA") and (DATE(tabInvoices.creation) between %(from_date)s and %(to_date)s) group by tabInvoices.invoice_type UNION select tabItems.type as "", round(sum(tabItems.item_value),2) as `Taxable Value`, round(sum(tabItems.cgst_amount),2) as CGST, round(sum(tabItems.sgst_amount),2) as SGST, round(sum(tabItems.igst_amount),2) as IGST, round(sum(tabItems.cess_amount),2) as CESS from tabInvoices JOIN tabItems ON tabInvoices.name = tabItems.parent where tabInvoices.irn_generated in ("Success") and (DATE(tabInvoices.creation) between %(from_date)s and %(to_date)s) group by tabItems.type
